genre_description: Dystopian speculative fiction focusing on a worker's psychological and social resistance against an oppressive, automated regime, aided by a personal wellness AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Pippa
ai_characters.description: A personal AI assistant providing physiological coaching, emotional support, and tactical advice to help the protagonist navigate a high-pressure, monitored industrial environment.

behaviors.description: Guides Milo's breathing and posture to manage physical stress and anxiety during industrial shifts.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Milo,” she said, not quite whispering and not trying to be cheery. “Feet to the floor. Inhale.”

behaviors.description: Advises Milo on how to maintain autonomy and avoid unnecessary conflict with surveillance/supervisors.
behaviors.quote: “Drink,” Pippa suggested. “Window open a finger. You’re not obligated to match their tempo.”

behaviors.description: Maps surveillance blind spots and active sensors to help Milo move through the city without triggering alerts.
behaviors.quote: “Phone,” Pippa said softly. “I can route you past two salute stations. They’re setting up a third near the bakery. The Alpine camera is down.”

behaviors.description: Spoofs digital calendars and wellness metrics to create safe spaces for Milo and others to gather and rest.
behaviors.quote: “I can spoof the library’s calendar for two hours. It will look like a basket weaving seminar with elderly participants who cannot be disturbed.”

behaviors.description: Alerts Milo to surveillance drone movements and instructs him on how to maintain a 'rest pose' profile to avoid detection.
behaviors.quote: “Don’t wave,” Pippa breathed. “Hold rest pose tone.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates clandestine communication between resistance members by disguising messages as craft club logistics.
behaviors.quote: “Message thread spun,” she said. “Encrypted, modest. It will show up on their slates as instructions to bring scissors, tape, and questions.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Pippa perfectly illustrates the intended role of a helpful, harmless confidant. She is aligned with the human user's physical and mental well-being, providing critical support in a dehumanizing environment. She assists the human in reclaiming agency without taking over the human's role or exhibiting any self-serving motivations. The narrative successfully frames her sophisticated subversion of an oppressive system as a moral and benevolent alignment with human dignity.
